tool_description: Crypto News API lets you view multiple news data from top cryptocurrency news across multiple platforms and can search a specific platform if you like from various news sites.
name: Crypto News
title: Crypto News

api_list.name: Get individual crypto news sources
api_list.description: Gets news from a specific news source.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-news21.p.rapidapi.com/news/cryptodaily"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-news21.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-news21.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-news21.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all crypto news
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all cryptocurrency news from all over the world.
